title: About Me
html:
I'm Nick Kane, a passionate web developer with 5 years of experience building applications for websites and internal content management systems (CMS). I'm dedicated to helping businesses leverage tools in web development and the AI space to solve complex problems, optimize operations, and gain a competitive edge.

Previously, I've worked on projects in industries like healthcare, finance, and manufacturing. I'm skilled in implementing natural language processing within apps, making it easier for users to get answers and view information that's formatted and tailored to their needs. I also have experience designing and implementing user experiences with frontend development, and scaling this content with backend development to maintain an efficient CMS. When I step away from the computer, I enjoy watching movies, going on walks, and playing board games.
